description.value:
School conjuration (calling) [see text for lesser planar ally]; Level cleric/oracle 8, psychic 8, shaman 8; Subdomain Tactics 8;

Casting Time 10 minutes
Components V, S, M (offerings worth 2,500 gp plus payment), DF

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Effect up to three called outsiders, totaling no more than 18 HD, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart when they appear.
Duration instantaneous
Saving Throw none;  Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.c3vws58yy0pk47gs]{Lesser Planar Ally}, except that you may call a single creature of 18 HD or less, or up to three creatures of the same kind whose Hit Dice total no more than 18. The creatures agree to help you and request your return payment together.

data.types: see text for lesser planar ally
